titles.title: Retired Civil Servant Military Service Restoration Act
Retired Civil Servant Military Service Restoration Act
To amend title 5, United States Code, to clarify the timing of deposits relating to the Civil Service Retirement System with respect to crediting military service, and for other purposes.
Retired Civil Servant Military Service Restoration Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management
